Implements #24024 for zlib.  This was actually rather straightforward--although zlib has a hand-written configure script, it seems to be fully compatible with one generated by autoconf.

Keywords: **destdir zlib**

Branch/Commit: **[847136b](https://github.com/sagemath/sagetrac-mirror/commit/847136bebf9dda971c4adf64b14d028d378c3250)**

Reviewer: **Julian Rüth**

Author: **Erik Bray**

Component: **build**

_Issue created by migration from https://trac.sagemath.org/ticket/25142_
